faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about ASMS
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and policies.

items.q: What types of storage services does ASMS offer?
items.a: ASMS offers two main options: self-storage with 24/7 access and full-service storage. Self-storage is ideal for frequent access, while full-service storage is more cost-effective for large items or long-term needs.

items.q: Where are ASMS facilities located and how do I access my items?
items.a: Our storage sites are located within apartment complexes and central areas. Self-storage users can access their units 24/7 via smart card or personal code. Full-service customers are accompanied by ASMS staff for added security.

items.q: What types of storage units are available?
items.a: We offer both air-conditioned (AC) and non-AC units. AC units maintain 23–25°C, protecting sensitive items such as wood, textiles, and electronics from humidity and mold.

items.q: How does ASMS keep my belongings secure?
items.a: All facilities are monitored 24/7 with motion sensors, personal PIN access, fingerprint verification, and private locks. Only authorized staff may access restricted areas.

items.q: Does ASMS provide moving and transportation services?
items.a: Yes. We offer full moving services including site inspection, packing, transport, and setup. Pickup and delivery options are also available upon request.

items.q: What items are prohibited from storage?
items.a: Weapons, illegal substances, flammable liquids, perishable food, live animals, and strong-odor items are prohibited for safety and hygiene reasons.

items.q: What amenities are available at ASMS facilities?
items.a: We offer shared workspaces, free Wi-Fi, coffee, beverages, restrooms, and packing materials. You can also purchase cartons, bubble wrap, and locks on-site.

items.q: What are the accepted payment methods and deposit terms?
items.a: ASMS accepts cash, bank transfer, credit card, and e-wallets. Payments are made monthly in advance. VAT invoices are available and deposits are refundable upon contract end.

items.q: Does ASMS offer insurance plans for stored items?
items.a: We offer flexible protection plans: Basic (free), Silver, Gold, and Platinum, covering from 500,000 VND up to 100,000,000 VND depending on the plan.
